keys: Find a way to get in
en: Find a way to get in

it: La porta di fronte si è aperta!

keys: Get in and take the idol!
en: Get in and take the idol!

keys: The idol is vanishing! Get back!
en: The idol is vanishing! Get back!

keys: It's a trap! Get out! Get out!
en: It's a trap! Get out! Get out!

keys: The golden idol was cursed, a trap almost killed you.
en: The golden idol was cursed, a trap almost killed you.
it: L'idolo d'oro era maledetto, ti ha quasi ucciso.

keys: This time you'll have to give up
en: This time you'll have to give up

keys: Sooner or later you'll catch the idol!
en: Sooner or later you'll catch the idol!
it: Prima o poi riuscirai a prendere l'idolo!
